title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 220.0 - Education departmental optional retirement program definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 220.0 - Education departmental optional retirement program definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part: (a) Professional services shall mean those
services which are performed by an employee who is required to have a
baccalaureate degree as a condition precedent to his employment. (b) The field of supervision of higher
education shall include the Commissioner of Education, the Executive Deputy

Commissioner of Education, the Deputy Commissioner of Education (Higher and

Professional Education), the Deputy Commissioner of Education (Elementary, Secondary and Continuing Education), the Associate Commissioner of Education
(Higher Education), the Associate Commissioner of Education (Research and

Evaluation), the Associate Commissioner of Education (Science, Technology and
the Professions), the Associate Commissioner of Education (Cultural Education), and shall further include those positions under the supervision of each of the
above-designated associate commissioners which are primarily concerned with
education in advance of secondary education. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
220.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
